divs: Sighting DetailsA couple of friends saw them in the sky from the other side of town. I then looked up and saw them also. None of us could hear any sounds overhead even though is was a cool damp night where sounds travels easily long distances.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Guelph
There was one other sighting in Guelph on or around September 13th 2013
Summary: flying orbs sort of rose over horizon, and then all followed the same arched path, then at one point ascended straight up which eliminated them from potentially being helicopters. they also seemed to look like flares being launched, but kelpt rising
